metadata.title: CVE-2017-8855 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
wolfSSL before 3.11.0 does not prevent wc_DhAgree from accepting amalformed DH key.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 3.13.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
